parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags. Valid values:

- true: Removes all tags from the specified zones.

- false: Removes only the tags that have the specified tag keys (TagKey.N).

Default value: false.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the return value. Valid values:

- zh: Chinese.

- en: English.

Default value: en.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: A list of resource IDs, which are the zone IDs. You can specify up to 50 resource IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to ZONE.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: A list of tag keys. You can specify up to 20 tag keys.
